reason_for_emotion: The claimant is reported to have sustained injuries to his back and is anticipated to be anxious about his health and the outcome of his claim
claim_summary: Bugs Bunny was rear-ended while stationary at a traffic light, sustaining soft tissue injuries to his back. There is no police report provided yet.
reason_for_further_assessment: A police report detailing the incident is still needed for a full assessment of the claim
